name: Sajid Mohammad
topdescription: Full Stack Developer with 4 years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, Unit Tests, and deploying secure, scalable web applications. Proficient in the MEAN stack (MongoDB, MySQL, MSSQL, Express.js, Angular, Node.js), delivering 30+ robust projects. Passionate about solving real-world problems, ensuring code quality, and staying updated with emerging technologies.

servicescontainer.s_des: Versatile developer proficient in building end-to-end web applications, combining front-end and back-end expertise to deliver robust and scalable solutions.
Experienced in full-cycle development of web applications using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js). Skilled in integrating front-end and back-end seamlessly.
Experienced in full-cycle development of web applications using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). Skilled in integrating front-end and back-end seamlessly.
Proficient in building server-side applications and APIs with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Experienced in creating scalable and secure back-end solutions.
Proficient in developing automation scripts and workflows using Node.js to optimize processes and enhance efficiency.

Specialized in developing dynamic and responsive front-end applications using Angular (versions 9 to 16), Angular Material, and Tailwind CSS. Expertise in creating scalable web applications with enhanced user experience.
Web designers craft the overall vision & plan for a website layout. Professional logo development: Business, Company, or Personal.
Creative graphic designer skilled in crafting visually appealing designs, including logos, banners, and social media creatives, using tools like Photoshop and Canva.

skills_container.skill_des: Strong foundation in creating structured and semantic web pages using HTML. Skilled in building responsive layouts and integrating multimedia elements.
Basic understanding of styling web pages with CSS, including layout, colors, and typography.
Proficient in using Bootstrap 5 for creating responsive and mobile-first web designs with prebuilt components.
Expert in implementing Angular Material for building modern and user-friendly UI components with a focus on material design principles.
Experienced in integrating NG and NGX Bootstrap to enhance Angular applications with pre-designed components.
Solid understanding of JavaScript, including DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, and modern ES features.
Skilled in TypeScript for building scalable and maintainable applications with strong typing and object-oriented programming concepts.
Experienced in leveraging modern JavaScript features introduced in ES6 to ES21, including modules, promises, and async/await.
Proficient in real-time, bidirectional communication using Socket.IO for chat applications, live updates, and collaborative tools.
Skilled in using HighchartJS to create interactive and dynamic charts for data visualization in web applications.
Experienced in creating visually appealing and responsive charts using ChartJS to present data effectively.
Proficient in using jQuery for simplifying DOM manipulation, event handling, and creating dynamic web content.
Expertise in building scalable and dynamic web applications using Angular versions 9 to 16, leveraging features like Ivy, RxJS, and modular architecture.
Proficient in implementing server-side rendering with Angular Universal to improve SEO and performance for Angular applications.
Skilled in managing state efficiently in Angular applications using Redux and NgRx and NgXS for scalable and maintainable solutions.
Experienced in building high-performance, event-driven server-side applications using Node.js and its rich ecosystem.
Proficient in developing RESTful APIs and server-side applications using Express.js with middleware integration for robust solutions.
Skilled in using Nest.js for creating modular, scalable, and maintainable server-side applications with TypeScript.
Experienced in building cross-platform desktop applications using Electron.js, integrating front-end technologies like Angular and Node.js.
Proficient in managing dependencies and scripts using NPM, including creating and publishing custom packages for Node.js applications.
Experienced in designing responsive and visually appealing email templates that ensure compatibility across devices and email clients.
Proficient in using Laravel for building secure and feature-rich web applications with MVC architecture and seamless database management.
Skilled in managing and querying large-scale databases with MSSQL, including stored procedures, triggers, and performance optimization.
Proficient in designing, maintaining, and optimizing relational databases using MySQL for scalable and efficient data storage solutions.
Expert in writing and optimizing SQL queries and stored procedures to enhance database performance and efficiency.
Skilled in identifying and mitigating top OWASP vulnerabilities to ensure secure web application development.
Authentication, Authorization, Rate Limiting, Data Sanitization, Encryption, Error Handling, Logging and Monitoring, Security Headers, Token Expiry, IP Whitelisting, Secure Dependencies.
Experienced in using Inno Setup Script for creating robust and customizable .exe installers for Windows applications.
Proficient in version control using Git and GitHub, including branching, merging, and repository management.
Skilled in using SVN Tortoise for managing version control in collaborative projects and maintaining code integrity.
Experienced in leveraging AWS services like EC2, S3, and RDS for scalable cloud-based applications and deployments.
Proficient in configuring Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment pipelines to automate development workflows.
Experienced in using Ansible for automating application deployment, configuration management, and orchestration.
Skilled in using Puppet for managing infrastructure as code and automating system configurations across environments.
Proficient in containerizing applications using Docker to ensure consistency across development and production environments.
Experienced in deploying and managing containerized applications with Kubernetes for scalable and reliable solutions.
Skilled in using Jira for agile project management, issue tracking, and workflow customization to improve team productivity.
Skilled in managing projects to ensure timely completion with high-quality standards.
Proven ability to lead and mentor teams effectively, fostering collaboration and productivity.
Strong analytical skills to identify and resolve complex technical issues efficiently.
Capable of meeting tight deadlines while maintaining focus on project goals.
Proficient in adapting to new technologies and methodologies to deliver optimal results.
Basic communication skills to coordinate with cross-functional teams.
Hands-on experience in developing scalable and secure applications using the MEAN stack ,Full Stack and other modern tools.
Thorough in code reviews, ensuring quality and adherence to best practices.
